did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Ephemera collected by Coyote, including items of San Francisco's Sisters of Perpetual Indulgence; a safe sex pamphlet; a Shere Hite questionnaire on male sexuality; catalogs and correspondence pertaining to models of human genitalia; sex tourism advertisments; sexual merchandise catalogs; sex education newsletter for teens; and other printed material, newsletters, testimony, and news releases on matters pertaining to sex and sexuality.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Ephemera collected by Coyote, including items of San Francisco's Sisters of Perpetual Indulgence; a safe sex pamphlet; a Shere Hite questionnaire on male sexuality; catalogs and correspondence pertaining to models of human genitalia; sex tourism advertisments; sexual merchandise catalogs; sex education newsletter for teens; and other printed material, newsletters, testimony, and news releases on matters pertaining to sex and sexuality.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Sexuality ephemera, #7614. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.

relatedmaterial.head: NOTES
relatedmaterial.p: Related collection: Coyote Records, Schlesinger Library, Radcliffe College: MHVW85-A115
